# Resources

This page links to tools, case studies, templates, and other documents to help
make Reproducible Analytical Pipelines. Contribute to resources by discussing
them in the [Slack
channel](https://govdatascience.slack.com/messages/C6H22U3H9/)
(#rap_collaboration) or by opening an [issue on
GitHub](https://github.com/ukgovdatascience/rap-website/issues).

::: {.unbulleted-list}
* [RAP Online Course](https://www.udemy.com/reproducible-analytical-pipelines/)
* [Case Study: Benefits of RAP](resource-case-study-benefits-2017.html)
* [How to choose tools and infrastructure](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/choose-tools-and-infrastructure-to-make-better-use-of-your-data)
* [How to ask for help on Slack](resource-ask-for-help-on-slack.html)
* [Learn at Coffee and Coding sessions](resource-coffee-and-coding.html)
* [NHS NSS Transforming Publications Toolkit](resource-nhs-nss-transforming-publications-toolkit.html)
* [Use RAP to help conform to the Data Ethics Framework](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/5-use-robust-practices-and-work-within-your-skillset#reproducibility)
* [Style guides and methodologies](resource-style-guides.html)
:::
